ComicInfo.Series: Evil Ernie vs. the Movie Monsters
ComicInfo.Summary:
In the same vain as the Evil Ernie Vs the Super Heroes series this pits Ernie in a what-if situation where Ernie gets to battle some of the all time greatest movie monsters in a very one sided confrontation.
In this issue Ernie's parents don't like Monster movies and torture their son my making him watching musicals and family films. When they catch him reading horror comics they burn them.
Ernie battles: Dracula, The Beast from Haunted Lagoon, giant ants and spiders and all manner of icon movie monsters.
